summary: After being wounded in a fight, Zatoichi is nursed to health by a young woman and her father. Now indebted to the family, he works to protect their ferry business from local thugs.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Tatsuo Endô|Takashi Etajima|Ryûtarô Gomi|Bokuzen Hidari|Ryôsuke Kagawa|Jun Katsumura|Naoko Kubo|Ikuko Môri|Mayumi Nagisa|Yutaka Nakamura|Koh Sugita|Teruko Ômi
title: Zatôichi abare tako
